job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description:
Looking for an Embedded Software Engineer who will be developing code for new electric vehicles.


Candidates must have a strong background in Automotive or Electric Vehicle industry to be considered for this role.


Skills/Experience Required:


· 5+ years experience in the automotive / EV industry

· C++, Python

· Coding for Software, Firmware or hardware applications

· understanding of BMS or Inverters

· Hands-on

· B.S. or higher in technical field
